text: Joe Hrudka is a pioneering American gasser drag racer.Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars (Cartech, 2003), pp.181-. Driving a 1957 Chevrolet, he won NHRA's D/Gas national title at Indianapolis Raceway Park in 1961. His winning pass was 12.73 seconds at .Davis, p.182. The next year, at the wheel of the Peters & Betz team's 1955 Chevrolet (with a transplanted Chevrolet engine), he won a second NHRA DGas national title at Indianapolis. His winning pass there was 13.37 seconds at .Davis, p.183. In 1967, the Hrudka Brothers' 1933 Willys panel delivery was a popular wheelstander.Davis, p.13 caption. Hrudka would later found Mr. GasketGainesville Sun online (retreieved 5 June 2017) (now a division of Holley Performance Products. ==References== ==Sources== *Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars.
